title: Servers
body: Can you guys fix your god damn servers? Like holy shit. Everyone disconnects in every game for about 20 min or until minions win the game and then we get banned by leavebuster because your servers don't work. Fun game.

replies.body:
This game has just been horrible for the past few weeks. Honestly, I have lost multiple games because of DC'ed team members -and have probably won my share of them too. I'm lucky if I get a loss prevented for them 50% of the time. I'm terrified to even try a ranked game because of the crap shoot the servers have become. Maybe spend less resources on balance patches and fixing your new champs and ensure the game is playable first.

Seriously take a note from Valve and how DotA runs for them. They have significantly less man power than you guys do -they also actually let their community contribute to the game in a meaningful way, not the point though-, but their client and server are incredibly reliable. You guys have a great product in LoL but the quality of it has been questionable at best the last month; and if not fixed I think you'll see your player base begin to dwindle quickly.
My same points, well said.

The server issues are becoming pervasive. Just now I had a massive DC issue, where everyone was DC'ing the entire game, and I am banned from playing normal games because I was stuck in a game that ended. My only option was to end the game from Task Manager. Now I have a ban as a result. 

This is unfair for players who follow the summoners code.

After playing more than a couple of thousand games, for the first time I got banned for a day by the LeaveBuster?  And why, because after the patch a few days ago, every game I tried ends with Bug Splat, and reconnection is hell!  Oh, I did reconnected after several minutes and several tries, and i did finished the game as well except for one which ended already when I finally reconnected.

Now you say there is a problem with the server, and yet you blame us for 'idling by/disconnecting' and sanction us with a ban?  How dare you?  Did you even consider bug splat reports when giving sanctions?

Guess what?  I tried using an alternate account, got problems connecting again.  When I finally did, and when I finally got into a game, game start resulted to Bug Splat again.  More than 10x I tried reconnecting, all resulting to bug splat and crash.  Restarting the computer then reconnecting again got me nowhere.  My game is still on the 'Reconnect' screen as I post this.  I guess your LeaveBuster would level up my alternate account as well, wouldn't it? Good job RIOT!

[](http://prntscr.com/4nwlx9)
might not want to swear they make more of an effort to ban for being pissed off I've noticed. But I am really sick of this crap too.

So, coming back to play League from Destiny's PvP ***(which the delay in hit-reg is terrible in as of right now.*** Rest of t is great.) I come to find in the past few days alone to find unbearable lag-spikes ranging from **500-900 ms**, connection issues to the client, disconnections mid game, and total losses for 2 straight days because when I can find a group that doesn't D/C, they are terrible or the team is just ridiculously made with 0 chances of winning. Would like to see the ability to actually win something for a change this week..
Win something? You mean to say, "..play the game this week."

Packet Loss / 500 ms ping just now.. in my promos waiting to reconnect to server! 

YAY FUN TIMES

Just dc'd from a game and couldn't reconnect so not only do i get to lose my promos, but I also am going to get reported 3-5 times. Had 131 ping, 61 fps and was unable to even move my champion. When I told my support all he said was "yeah happened to me last game" how prevalent is this that going one game without lag is lucky.
Riot i thought you love me long time?
New servers pls, these ones are dead.

THANK YOU. I just received a 7 day ban because of riot's bs servers, BUT WAIT. I know what you're thinking.. "dude you would have had to leave a whole lot of games to get a 7 day ban" SHUT THE FRONT DOOR. ALL of my leaves were a result of substandard server quality, back a couple weeks ago when the servers had immense amounts of lag that's when it all started, then today now I join a team builder game everyone ready's up and i go to watch a youtube vid while i wait for loading screen.. check back in a couple of seconds, I'm at the home screen going wudduhfuq as I think "oh maybe someone left or something gg that penalty." So I try to join another team builder and I get an error message saying I'm already in a game, so at this point I'm like rito ples. I exit re-log and join the game, 10 seconds "the game has crashed please reconnect" "lel ok rito" I reconnect. BOOM game crashes again *such surprise* I reconnect.. AGAIN. BOOM POW get hit with the idler and I have to leave, reconnect again we lose QQ, then I receive a message saying I'm suspended QQ some more. RITO WHY?! I know I sound like a little raging Feggit, but I don't believe I'm in the wrong, I've spent time and money on this game to then get kicked in the ass by a fucked up system that has needed fixing for even longer than Morgana stuns, "wow Ginomai, dat long?" Yes dat long.

Yeah, I'm not really understanding the lag myself. 

It's been happening for about a week for me, but particularly since the new patch, the lag is unbearable. I'm disconnecting every single game while my internet is working perfectly (i.e. spotify is still playing, browser is still working, internet at 5 bars). Ranked is a nightmare because people disconnect every game. not just me, usually 2-3 other people as well.

This needs to stop, and it needs to be put in the spotlight.

Just got a leave on my record thanks to these servers. I noticed one other thing. These boards have extreme lag. If I go on a non-Riot website, the page loads in a timely manner, but not any portion of this site.
Bump

Riot........i wish you better luck in getting your servers under control than i have had in my games these last few weeks. If your staff is lagging as bad as my champion has been lately then can only pray for the future of your game...

sincerely,
Good Luck
For some reason i try to start a match and i get stuck on the reconnect screen when the game starts. it's forced me to dodge twice now. hope its fixed by the time i get out of work tonight :-)

Hey everyone,

I updated another thread regarding the server issues going on right now, but I wanted to make sure to jump into this discussion as well.

Make sure to check out our[ Server Status page](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/?en_US#na) for the latest information!

We'll update it as soon as we have any new information to share!
And what is Riot going to do to prevent future problems? That's honestly all I care about right now. And saying "we are aware that there is lag" is not acceptable when that's all we get.
Actually then don't even accept that it's a problem with Riot. It's every single person and event fault except anything related to Riot.

Our problem with riot right now is that you are spending all this time loading down your servers with new champions, updated graphics and other aspects that only contribute to more lag. The more you put on your server the more you hinder its performance. What you need to do is stop putting out new things this season. Stop making minor changes that lead to more lag. stop adding new champions and game modes just log enough that your team can sit down and asses the server situation. Your player base is getting angry and you don't appear to care. You guys are handling this situation like the US government, " you guys have a problem with connection? well here are some new champions, and a new game mode. Did that make the lag go away?"

So I implore you, stop adding to the problem. The only thing you should be working on right now is the state of your servers. No more champions no more game modes. Get the servers back to prime condition, then start introducing new aspects to the game. You should assess your servers after every thing you add to the servers. Release a new patch with all your updates. Step back and observe for a while. Fix problems, make sure servers are stable, then work on the next new set of changes. Never make new changes when you have a current problem on your hands cause then you end up stacking problems on top of problems and the difficulty level in fixing it just increases exponential.
